en.welcome: Welcome to the mortgage loan calculator!
en.principal: What is the amount of the loan?
en.interestRate: What is interest rate/APR? (Example: Enter 5.75% as 5.75)
en.loanLength: What is the loan length in years?
en.invalidNumber: That is not a valid number, enter a valid number.
en.invalidLoanTerm: Loan length must be a valid number and greater than 0, enter a valid number of years
en.runAgain: If you would like to run the mortgage calculator program again (y/n)?
